items.summary: Update frontend/src/components/Navigation.tsx to reposition the logo image with proper spacing and alignment, ensuring it displays to the left of the 'CareerSphere' text with adequate margin (e.g., mr-2 or mr-3) and maintains vertical centering with the text

Update frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx hero section to reposition the logo image with proper layout structure, ensuring it displays centered above the 'CareerSphere' title with adequate spacing (e.g., mb-4 or mb-6) and maintains visual hierarchy in the hero section

Verify the logo image file exists at frontend/public/assets/logo.png (or frontend/public/assets/generated/logo.png if generated) and is correctly referenced in both Navigation.tsx and Home.tsx with proper src attributes using absolute paths starting with /assets/
